title: Is There a Kind of Freedom That Doesn't Make Nihilism Inevitable?  Exploring The Legacy of Idealism
description:
Matt and Karen have a wide ranging discussion about the types of freedom, the problematizing of history through time and the phenomena of "this little corner of the internet".

It's a wild ride. Come along for the fun.
